name: job-search
description: A comprehensive job search assistant for intelligent research, analysis, and career planning

commands.name: personal-analysis
commands.description: Build and maintain your user profile with skills, experience, and preferences

commands.name: find-company
commands.description: Research companies based on your criteria (area, industry, culture)

commands.name: find-position
commands.description: Identify career positions based on your skills and experience level

commands.name: find-job-postings
commands.description: Discover and rank relevant job postings matching your profile

commands.name: ingest-job
commands.description: Add a job posting from URL or pasted content for analysis

commands.name: update-job-status
commands.description: Move a job through the application pipeline (interested → applied → interviewed → offered → rejected)

commands.name: skill-builder
commands.description: Map your skills, identify gaps, and create improvement plans

commands.name: tailor-resume
commands.description: Generate a tailored resume for a specific job posting
